unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.detail: Authentication credentials were not provided or are invalid.

unauthorized_api_key.openapi_example_summary: API key is missing or invalid.
unauthorized_api_key.title: Unauthorized API Key
unauthorized_api_key.detail: The provided API key is missing or invalid. Please provide a valid API key.

unprocessable_entity.title: Unprocessable Entity
unprocessable_entity.detail: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

validation_error.title: Validation Error
validation_error.detail: The input data did not pass validation checks.
validation_error.max_length: The field '{field}' must be at most {max_length} characters.

internal_server_error.title: Internal Server Error
internal_server_error.detail: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.detail: The requested resource could not be found.

bad_request.title: Bad Request
bad_request.detail: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.detail: You do not have permission to access this resource.
